page.title: 09TEENAGE LIFE - LITTLE WITLEY
page.content: {A TYPICAL WEEKEND During termtime there is always some {homework}to do at weekends. Although I try to do as much as I can during the week, there is always some left over for Saturday. So on a Saturday morning I finish my homework and as I am lucky enough to have my own{pony}I generally go for a ride in the afternoon. We have quite a few bridleways around my area, but many of them are difficult to ride through. My weekends are mostly taken up with my pony and sometimes on a Sunday I hack to a local show. Although riding is the fun part of owning a pony, there are also many hours of hard work involved in jobs such as cleaning tack and mucking out the stable. Sometimes on a Saturday evening I go into Worcester to meet my friends and go to the Rollo Disco. Sallyann Owen
